Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent
local UserInputTypes = { CreateRope = 1; BreakRope = 2; }
local UserInputRemoteEvent = script.Parent:WaitForChild("UserInput")
function onButton1Down(mouse) --print("Local mousedown") UserInputRemoteEvent:FireServer(UserInputTypes.CreateRope, mouse.Hit.p) end
function onKeyDown(key) print("Local keydown") key = key:lower() if key == "q" then UserInputRemoteEvent:FireServer(UserInputTypes.BreakRope) end end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) print("Local equipped") if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) mouse.KeyDown:connect(onKeyDown) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() UserInputRemoteEvent:FireServer(UserInputTypes.BreakRope) end)

-- A hacked together modification of the Grapple Hook Shot gear --
local bolts = {} local maxBolts = 8 local boltLifetime = 10
local currentBolt = nil
local UserInputTypes = { CreateRope = 1; BreakRope = 2; }
local UserInputRemoteEvent = script.Parent:WaitForChild("UserInput")
local maxDistance = 200 local hopUpVelocity = 20 local boltSpeed = 120 local RetractionSpeed = 60 local StartDistance = 100
local canFireWhileGrappling = true
local Tool = script.Parent; local torso = nil local human = nil --local boltconnect = nil --local holdweld = nil
local defaultPos = Vector3.new(0,-.09,1.1) local adjustedPos = Vector3.new(0,0,.605)
--local rope = Instance.new("Part")
--rope.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Black")
--[[rope.TopSurface = 0 rope.BottomSurface = 0 rope.formFactor = "Symmetric" rope.Name = "Rope" rope.CanCollide = false rope.Anchored = true local mesh = Instance.new("CylinderMesh") mesh.Parent = rope mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.1,1,0.1)--]]
local PlayerBodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") PlayerBodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(1e+006, 1e+006, 1e+006) local ObjectBodyVelocities = {} local ObjectBodyVelocityBackup = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") ObjectBodyVelocityBackup.maxForce = Vector3.new(5000,5000,5000) --force necessary to forcefully grab a player
local bodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") bodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge,math.huge,math.huge)
function BreakRope(bolt) if not bolt then return end if human then human.Sit = false end
local rope = bolt:FindFirstChild("Rope") if rope then rope:Destroy() end
destroyBolt(bolt)
--wait(.45) if bolt == nil then bodyGyro.Parent = nil --keep the gyro a little longer so retracted object doesnt ragdoll player end --script.Parent.Bolt.Transparency = 0 end
function adjustRope() for i,v in pairs(bolts) do if v and torso then if (torso.Position - v.Position).magnitude > maxDistance then BreakRope(v) end end end end
function updateVelocities() local bolt = currentBolt if bolt and torso then local grappleVector = (torso.Position - bolt.Position) local distanceToBolt = grappleVector.magnitude if distanceToBolt > maxDistance then BreakRope(bolt) return end if bolt.Velocity.magnitude < 3 and -1* torso.Velocity:Dot(grappleVector.unit) < 5 and grappleVector.magnitude < .75 * StartDistance then --print("hop up") --PlayerBodyVelocity.velocity = PlayerBodyVelocity.velocity + Vector3.new(0,hopUpVelocity,0) wait(.25) BreakRope(bolt) return end if grappleVector.magnitude < 3.5 then --print("grapple end") wait(.20) BreakRope(bolt) return else if (ObjectBodyVelocities[bolt] ~= nil) then ObjectBodyVelocities[bolt].velocity = grappleVector.unit * RetractionSpeed end local boltRetraction = math.max(grappleVector.unit:Dot(bolt.Velocity),0) --no negative speed local playerSpeed = math.max(0, RetractionSpeed - 5 - boltRetraction) if playerSpeed == 0 then PlayerBodyVelocity.Parent = nil else PlayerBodyVelocity.Parent = torso local xzMultiplier = 0.7 local yMultiplier = ((distanceToBolt / StartDistance)) local velocityWeightedByDistance = grappleVector.unit * playerSpeed * -1 velocityWeightedByDistance = Vector3.new(velocityWeightedByDistance.x * xzMultiplier, velocityWeightedByDistance.y * yMultiplier, velocityWeightedByDistance.z * xzMultiplier) PlayerBodyVelocity.velocity = velocityWeightedByDistance end end else BreakRope(bolt) end end
function destroyBolt(bolt) if (bolt == currentBolt) then currentBolt = nil if PlayerBodyVelocity then PlayerBodyVelocity.Parent = nil end bodyGyro.Parent = nil end if ObjectBodyVelocities[bolt] then ObjectBodyVelocities[bolt]:Destroy() end
for i,v in pairs(bolts) do if v == bolt then table.remove(bolts, i) end end
bolt:Destroy() --print("Bolt destroyed")
--[[local bolt = getPrimaryBolt() if (bolt ~= nil) then PlayerBodyVelocity.Parent = torso PlayerBodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0,0,0) bodyGyro.cframe = torso.CFrame bodyGyro.Parent = torso end--]] end
function destroyOldBolts(retainThis) for i,v in pairs(bolts) do if (v ~= retainThis) then table.remove(bolts, i) v:Destroy() end end end
function addBolt(bolt) table.insert(bolts, bolt) game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(bolt, boltLifetime) end
function canFireBolt() local numBolts = 0 for _,v in pairs(bolts) do numBolts = numBolts + 1 end return (numBolts < maxBolts) end
function getPrimaryBolt() return currentBolt end
function isPrimaryBolt(bolt) return (bolt == currentBolt) end
function onBoltHit(bolt, hit) if bolt == nil or hit == nil or hit.Parent == nil or hit == rope or bolt.Name ~= "Bolt" or hit.Parent == Tool or hit.Parent == Tool.Parent or hit.Parent.Parent == Tool.Parent or hit.Parent.Name == "Attached Bolt" then return end
--print("onBoltHit")
currentBolt = bolt destroyOldBolts(bolt)
local grappleVector = (torso.Position - bolt.Position) StartDistance = grappleVector.magnitude if StartDistance > maxDistance then destroyBolt(bolt) return end
bolt.Name = "Attached Bolt" local boltFrame = CFrame.new(hit.Position)
local C0 = hit.CFrame:inverse() * boltFrame local C1 = bolt.CFrame:inverse() * boltFrame local weld = Instance.new("Weld") weld.Part0 = hit weld.Part1 = bolt weld.C0 = C0 weld.C1 = C1 weld.Parent = bolt
local hum = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if hum then hum.Sit = true end
if bolt:FindFirstChild("HitSound") then bolt.HitSound:play() end local backupbolt = bolt
local ObjectBodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") ObjectBodyVelocities[bolt] = ObjectBodyVelocity ObjectBodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(5000,5000,5000) ObjectBodyVelocity.velocity = grappleVector.unit * RetractionSpeed ObjectBodyVelocity.Parent = bolt
--wait(0.4) if bolt == nil or bolt ~= backupbolt then return end bolt.ConnectSound:play() Tool.Handle.ConnectSound:play()
if isPrimaryBolt(bolt) then PlayerBodyVelocity.Parent = torso PlayerBodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0,0,0) bodyGyro.cframe = torso.CFrame bodyGyro.Parent = torso end
end
enabled = true local canReset = true
function onButton1Down(pos) --print("onMouseDown server handler")
if not enabled then return end if not canFireBolt() then --[[print("Cannot fire another bolt")--]] return end
Tool.Handle.FireSound:play()
enabled = false
--print("Creating new bolt") local bolt = Instance.new("Part") bolt.Archivable = false Tool.Handle.ConnectSound:Clone().Parent = bolt bolt.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Symmetric bolt.Name = "Bolt" bolt.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1) bolt.Locked = false bolt.Transparency = 1 addBolt(bolt)
local rope = Instance.new("SelectionPartLasso") rope.Name = "Rope" rope.Color = BrickColor.new("White") rope.Parent = bolt rope.Part = bolt rope.Humanoid = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") rope.Visible = true
bolt.CFrame = CFrame.new(Tool.Handle.Position + (pos - Tool.Handle.Position).unit * 5,pos) --* CFrame.fromEulerAnglesXYZ(0,math.pi,0) bolt.Transparency = 1 bolt.CanCollide = false
bolt.Velocity = bolt.CFrame.lookVector * boltSpeed
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(0,bolt:GetMass() * 196.1,0) force.Parent = bolt bolt.Parent = Tool.Parent --bolt.AncestryChanged:connect(function() onKeyDown("q") end) bolt.Touched:connect(function(hit) onBoltHit(bolt, hit) end)
bolt.Parent = Tool.Parent
--oo rebel
--Tool.GripPos = adjustedPos canReset = false wait(.3) enabled = true canReset = true wait(1) end
function getHumanoid(obj) for i,child in pairs(obj:getChildren()) do if child.className == "Humanoid" then return child end end end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) --print("onEquippedLocal") if mouse == nil then --print("Mouse not found") return end
torso = Tool.Parent:findFirstChild("Torso") human = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if torso == nil or human == nil then return end --human.Jumping:connect(function() onKeyDown("q") end)
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) --Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() onKeyDown("q") end)
function PlayerIsOwnerOfTool(player) if Tool and Tool.Parent then local plyr = game:GetService("Players"):GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent) if plyr == player then return true end end print("Player not owner of tool") return false end
UserInputRemoteEvent.OnServerEvent:connect(function(player, ...) --print("Server received event from client") if (PlayerIsOwnerOfTool(player)) then local userInputType = select(1, ...) local data = select(2, ...)
if (userInputType == UserInputTypes.CreateRope) then local targetPosition = data onButton1Down(targetPosition) elseif (userInputType == UserInputTypes.BreakRope) then --disabled end end end)
while true do adjustRope() updateVelocities() wait(1/60) end
